description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=1/3. Build up your army and guide King Arthur through Camelot! A mix of Tower Defense, Action and Strategy, Path of King Arthur contains all of your favorite Camelotia characters, and some of your least favorite, too!
description.short: Build up your army and guide King Arthur through Camelot! A mix of Tower Defense, Action and Strategy, Path of King Arthur contains all of your favorite Camelotia characters, and some of your least favorite, too!
